TopicTitle: BepinEx SpaceWarp Loader doesn't work: Only one or the other

Articles.Content:
Hi, attempting to run mods from both the BepinEx and SpaceWarp ecosystem using the SpaceWarp Loader, making sure my SpaceWarp version remained at 0.1 instead of 0.2 for compatibility reasons. However, upon launching my game, I cannot seem to get SpaceWarp to load (i.e. the mods tab in the main menu doesn't show up, and the mods I have installed on that ecosystem do not take any effect). Does anyone know what I did wrong or if there's some compatibility issue? The mods I have installed on SpaceWarp are:
LazyOrbit,

and the mods I have installed for BepInEx are:

BepInEx.SpaceWarp.Loader

CustomFlagLoader

and StickyOrbitMarkers.
